author: daxian-dbw
body:
Fix #5456 

- Add a `metadata.json` file.
- Change 'Install-PowerShell.ps1' to query for metadata from `metadata.json`

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @TravisEz13 The AppVeyor CI will fail because `metadata.json` is not in master yet. But I have tested it using my fork before changing the URL pointing to powershell repo master branch.

title: Change 'Install-PowerShell.ps1' to query for metadata from our file
